title: What are the most innovative news websites? - Quora

response.answer_text: The most innovative news website is World News. Why is this website the most innovative news website? Always fresh and new content.News, updates & stories from around the world.News from various credible sources.Simple and beautiful UI.Unbiased and worldwide content.Mobile-friendly website.Free Email updates of premium content.No disruptive ads at all.Provides its news app - Available on Play Store at World News 📰: A Global and International News App.Enjoy reading news and stay informed. Many more features as well. Easy to use and navigate. Thank you. Sharing is caring.

I can speak about the project I'm working for, http://www.lainformacion.com, based in Madrid (Spain). It's a news website where you can find the work of the journalists (with a special focus in graphics and video, which is something different), but with huge technological innovations about categorization, aggregation, clusterization and use of robots and the semantic web.
